comment.author: Travis
comment.text: Hillary believes in gun control to protect toddlers that won't even become toddlers because they'll be killed just before they're born

replies.author: Tori
replies.text: You take away and mess with Constitution that God set in place our freedom is gone they take guns away(which bad guys will have them anyway and the good guys won't be able to protect themselves don't make much sense) but they mess with our 2nd amendment you better be ready to set up and say bye to our freedom you are missing the whole pic

replies.author: Travis
replies.text: I'm totally with the second amendment

replies.author: Travis
replies.text: Tori you don't get that being sarcastic at her logic... I absolutely do not want her to be president, she'll finish off destroying the country
